remarks: The limit of a function at the lower bound of a closed interval only depends on the values in the inner open interval (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
limciccioolb.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
limciccioolb.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
limciccioolb.3 $e |- ( ph -> A < B ) $.
limciccioolb.4 $e |- ( ph -> F : ( A [,] B ) --> CC ) $.
limciccioolb $p |- ( ph -> ( ( F |` ( A (,) B ) ) limCC A ) = ( F limCC A ) ) $.
